| **Job Title** | Administration Manager | **Department:** | Administration |
| **Incumbent** |  | **Reports to:** | Director |
| **Date** |  |  |  |

Position Overview

* Assume responsibility for the overall Administrative function of the Kangopak Office
* BRCGS Document Controller
* Member of Risk Team

Essential Job Functions

* Responsible for entire Kangopak payroll function including adherence to all statutory requirements
* Assists when required with the Kangopak Logistics function
* Involvement in the Internal Sales
* Supervises the purchasing of all Kangopak consumable requirements
* Compliance with requirements of Product Safety and Quality Management system (BRC)
* Responsible for carrying out all Kangopak banking transactions
* Ad Hoc “Projects” i.e. CCTV Installation/Bidvest PPE project etc.
* Debtors collection
* Waste Control
* Coordinates the BRC Internal Audit function.

Requirements

* Minimum of 10 years extensive experience in office administration

Other Skills/Abilities

* Self-starter with Initiative
* Excellent organisational skills
* Computer literacy
* Proficient in PASTEL PAYROLL

Employee Manager

NOTE: This job description is not intended to be all-inclusive. Employee may perform other related duties as negotiated to meet the ongoing needs of the organization.
